document.full_text: a woman who accused american apparel inc chief executive dov charney of keeping her as a teenage sex slave is now suing him and his clothing retailer for defamation and invasion of privacy.
document.title: ex-workers say american apparel posted nude pix online
lines_and_colors: a woman who accused american apparel inc chief executive dov charney of keeping her as a teenage sex slave is now suing him and his clothing retailer for defamation and invasion of privacy.
